Text:
Thank you, this is funny. I've been looking for a working version and this has everything I wanted. I've been playing JA2 lately and wanted something more fluid even if it's not as good or faithful to the series. It still has its merits and is damn good in a nearly empty genre.

Too few games of this type to criticize it for being more or less dissimilar to the rest of the series.
Are there any patches integrated or included?
